definition: a "screw that never rusts" — sb who selflessly and wholeheartedly serves the Communist Party, like Lei Feng 雷鋒|雷锋[Lei2 Feng1], to whom the metaphor is attributed
pinyin: yong3 bu4 sheng1 xiu4 de5 luo2 si1 ding1

sentences.english: God is a caring Father who loves you and will never stop loving you.
sentences.chinese: 上帝是一个慈父，他爱你并且永不停息。

sentences.english: Your long summer will never fade.
Love is the smile had to drink the poisoned wine, Later he was driven, never regret.
sentences.chinese: 爱情原来是含笑饮毒酒，肝肠寸断，永不言悔。

sentences.english: If I try, never give it up, if I try, would I lie to you?
sentences.chinese: 只要我想要尝试，我将永不言弃，我会对你说谎吗？

sentences.english: I’ll never forget a class meeting I shared with my students some 6 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我永不会忘记6年前的那次学生班会。

sentences.english: They were destined never to meet again.
sentences.chinese: 命运注定他们永不再相逢。

sentences.english: With direction index, sapphire cover lens, never abrasion.
sentences.chinese: 带有方向标，蓝宝石镜头，永不磨损。

sentences.english: She left a suicide note let shu ping sedan must go, never back to the high house.
sentences.chinese: 她留下遗书让淑萍花轿来了一定要走，永不再回邱家。

sentences.english: Though thou shouldst bray a fool in the mortar, as when a pestle striketh upon sodden barley, his folly would not be taken from him.
sentences.chinese: 你尽可在臼中将愚人舂碎，但他的昏愚却永不能铲除。

sentences.english: In london, the traffic never seems to stop, and people always seem to be in a hurry.
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦，交通似乎永不停止，人们似乎总是来去匆匆。

sentences.english: Many students go through the gate and take a photo with it.
sentences.chinese: 很多学生从“永不挂科门”中穿过，或合影留念。

sentences.english: The clear-text password is never stored or compared when using this value.
sentences.chinese: 使用这个值时，将永不储存或比较清除文字式密码。

sentences.english: Race against time, never give up, believe in yourself, will win everything.
sentences.chinese: 争分夺秒，永不言弃，相信自己，将赢得一切胜利。

sentences.english: Wright envisaged the Guggenheim as “a curving wave that never breaks.”
sentences.chinese: 莱特把古根海姆看作是“永不断裂的连绵曲线”。

sentences.english: My motto is to never givie up.
sentences.chinese: 我的左右铭是永不言弃。

sentences.english: May we never forget each other.

definition: eternal/everlasting/fig. to pass into eternity (i.e. to die)
a whole lifetime (idiom); all my life
to start over/to do sth all over again
to live forever/eternal life/all one's life
